api_list.name: Categories grouped
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://swiss-jobmarket-live.p.rapidapi.com/cat/group/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "swiss-jobmarket-live.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: All jobs (pagination)
api_list.description: get all jobs ( /maxOutput(page ) with pagination option
api_list.code:
